description:
This Course is about Latest Mobile, PC technologies and their usage. We are going to provide professional video tutorials to learn new things. People who are interested particularly who belongs to Telugu Speaking community can benefit from this course.

It will take 30 hours to complete this course.

We are arranging mobile tips & pc tips in an proper manner.

Telugu speaking community living around the word facing problem to learn new technologies because there is no proper guidance. Here Mr. Sridhar Nallamothu, Editor, Computer Era Telugu Magazine which is publishing since 2001 providing professional quality videos which educate every aspect of new technology. It may be about latest gadgets, or useful smartphone applications or pc and mobile troubleshooting.
title: Mobile, PC Tech Tips by Computer Era Telugu
